thread.title: Proteas opt to bat in ODI-series decider against India
thread.title_full: Proteas opt to bat in ODI-series decider against India

author: NewsWire
title: Proteas opt to bat in ODI-series decider against India
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, Oct.25 (ANI): South Africa won the toss and elected to bat first in the fifth and high-octane ODI series decider against India here at Wankhede Stadium on Sunday. 
The tourists have brought in all-rounder Dean Elgar and paceman Kyle Abbott in place of Chris Morris and Aaron Phangiso, while India are going with an unchanged side. 
India won the winning momentum in the penultimate tie in Chennai on Thursday by claiming a 35-run win over South Africa ahead of the thrilling summit clash . (ANI) Related Posts
